commit.message: Added missing const to locals + made log message more clear.
return MAX2(max_address_bit, MINIMUM_MAX_ADDRESS_BIT) instead of the if to make the intention more clear.
Include runtime/os.hpp for os::errno_name and use SIZE_FORMAT instead of %zu.

Changed constants from #define to typed static const variables.
Changed the log_warning to a log_warning_p, so it is reported in hs_err
file.
mummap the result of mmap directly after the mmap call to be able to
break out of the loop, instead of check the max_address_bit ==
0 precondition.
Fixed an 'off by one' mistake.
8252500: ZGC on aarch64: Unable to allocate heap for certain Linux kernel configurations
